metadata.dc:author: Perez-Iruela, J A
Lopez-López, A
De Juan, R
Gómez Embuena, A
Cotrina-Monroy, A
Rodríguez-Torras, M L
metadata.dc:description: Allergic reactions to albumin nanocolloid are rare. Most of them are not potentially serious and in some cases treatment with antihistamines may be needed. We present a case of a patient with grade II right breast ductal carcinoma, in whom a lymphoscintigraphy was performed for sentinel lymph node detection. She had a type I hypersensitivity reaction following the administration of (⁹⁹m)Tc-albumin nanocolloid, which abated spontaneously without subsequent sequels.
metadata.dc:title: Notificación de una reacción adversa al (99m)Tc-nanocoloide de albúmina.
[Notification of an adverse effect to human albumin (⁹⁹m)Tc-nanocolloid].
